name: histographer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who writes about history: Modern histographers say this cannot be correct. Monsieur Augustus Waldemare Mentelle was histographer to King Louis XVI.
More examplesFewer examplesA French histographer wrote a detailed description of the palace.Histographers have accepted the need to consider the impact of external political forces on a society's history.
